application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T0638 Chinese Privet - Crown Lift to 2.5m over footpath, for pedestrian clearance. Clear building by 0.5m, to prevent damage to building, no change to overall height and spread. T4266 Holly - Pollard tree at 2m, current height 8m and spread 4m, reducing height by 6m and spread by 2m. T4186 Robinia - Lateral Prune to clear building by approx 2m, to prevent damage to building. No change to overall height and spread. T0633 Elder - Fell. Tree in significant decline, and close proximity to pedestrians / footpath and vehicles / road. T0629 Sycamore - Lift to clear street lamp by 1m, to allow light to illuminate street.T4252 Birch - Lift to clear street lamp by 1m, to allow light to illuminate street. No change to overall height and spread. T4246 Coast Redwood - Crown Lift to 3m, for pedestrian and vehicle clearance. T0658 Lawson Cypress - Crown Lift to 2.5m for pedestrian clearance.
